summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.5°C) and outside temperature (down 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11068 lux) and cloud levels (up 764 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13086 lux), cloud levels (up 1462 m), feels like temperature (up 4.5°C), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 763.7m lower than yesterday, 569.0m lower than the past week, 1462.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1222.7m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and dim or diffuse light conditions. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
